name: Preparation
description: The purpose of this, is to provide initial planning and preparation for the project. Every project has its own unique objectives, scope, and priorities.

name: Design
description: The purpose of this phase is to create the blueprint, which is detailed documentation of the business processes which  will be implemented by Calfus.

name:
Construction /
Validation
description: The purpose of this phase is continuous & Iterative configuration build & validation. During this phase,  the custom components will be developed & tested.â€‹

name: Transition
description: The purpose of this phase is to implement business and process requirements based on the business blueprint.

name: Production
description: The purpose of this phase is  to  configure the solution accepted during UAT to Prod environment,  migrate master data & open balances & release the system for go live.
